name: The Guy is Stucked in The Moon
name_original: The Guy is Stucked in The Moon
description:
You are an astronaut stuck on the moon trying to fuel his rocket to return to earth. The concept of the game is based on "Jetpac" made by the founder of "rare game".

WAD or Arrow Buttons - move and fly.

Z - Shoot.

S or Down Arrow - Drop the fuel.

Grab the fuel by touching it.

Don't let the rocket be destroyed by enemies and you only have one life.

Have fun!!!
